00272         *error = EagleLogger_Log(EagleLoggerSeverityUserError, msg);
00273         return EagleFalse;
00274     }
00275     
00276     /* make sure the number of columns match the number of values */
00277     if(EagleLinkedList_length(insert->names) != EagleLinkedList_length(insert->values)) {
00278         sprintf(msg, "There are %d columns and %d values", EagleLinkedList_length(insert->names),
00279                 EagleLinkedList_length(insert->values));
00280         *error = EagleLogger_Log(EagleLoggerSeverityUserError, msg);
00281         return EagleFalse;
00282     }
00283     
00284     /* make sure all the columns exist */
00285     for(cursor = EagleLinkedList_begin(insert->names), i = 0; NULL != cursor; cursor = cursor->next, ++i) {
00286         EagleDbSqlExpression *expr = (EagleDbSqlExpression*) cursor->obj, *valueExpr;
00287         EagleDbSqlValue *value;
00288         EagleDbColumn *col;
00289         
00290         /* they must be column names, expressions are not acceptable */
00291         if(EagleDbSqlExpressionTypeValue != expr->expressionType) {
00292             *error = EagleLogger_Log(EagleLoggerSeverityUserError, "You cannot use expressions for column names");
00293             return EagleFalse;
00294         }
00295         
00296         value = (EagleDbSqlValue*) expr;
00297         if(EagleDbSqlValueTypeIdentifier != value->type) {
00298             *error = EagleLogger_Log(EagleLoggerSeverityUserError, "You cannot use expressions for column names");
00299             return EagleFalse;
00300         }
00301         
00302         /* column name exists in the table? */
00303         col = EagleDbTable_getColumnByName(td->table, value->value.identifier);
00304         if(NULL == col) {
00305             sprintf(msg, "No such column '%s' in table '%s'", value->value.identifier, insert->table);
00306             *error = EagleLogger_Log(EagleLoggerSeverityUserError, msg);
00307             return EagleFalse;
00308         }
00309         
00310         /* make sure the types are correct */
00311         valueExpr = (EagleDbSqlExpression*) EagleLinkedList_get(insert->values, i);
00312         if(EagleDbSqlExpressionTypeValue != valueExpr->expressionType) {
00313             sprintf(msg, "Expressions in VALUES are not yet supported for column '%s'", col->name);
00314             *error = EagleLogger_Log(EagleLoggerSeverityUserError, msg);
00315             return EagleFalse;
00316         }
00317         
00318         /* match data type */
00319         if(EagleFalse == EagleDbSqlValue_castable((EagleDbSqlValue*) valueExpr, col->type)) {
00320             char *type1 = EagleDataType_typeToName(col->type);
00321             char *type2 = EagleDbSqlValueType_toString(((EagleDbSqlValue*) valueExpr)->type);
00322             
00323             sprintf(msg, "Type for column %s is %s, but %s given.", col->name, type1, type2);
00324             
00325             EagleMemory_Free(type1);
00326             EagleMemory_Free(type2);
00327             *error = EagleLogger_Log(EagleLoggerSeverityUserError, msg);
00328             return EagleFalse;
00329         }
00330     }
00331     
00332     /* everything looks good, we can create the tuple now */
00333     tuple = EagleDbTuple_New(td->table);
00334     
00335     for(cursor = EagleLinkedList_begin(insert->names), i = 0; NULL != cursor; cursor = cursor->next, ++i) {
00336         char *colName = ((EagleDbSqlValue*) cursor->obj)->value.identifier;
00337         EagleDbColumn *col;
00338         int colIndex;
00339         EagleDbSqlValue *v;
00340         
00341         colIndex = EagleDbTable_getColumnIndex(td->table, colName);
00342         col = EagleDbTable_getColumnByName(td->table, colName);
00343         v = ((EagleDbSqlValue*) EagleLinkedList_get(insert->values, i));
00344         
00345         EagleDbTuple_set(tuple, colIndex, v, col->type);
00346     }
00347     
00348     /* do the INSERT */
00349     EagleDbTableData_insert(td, tuple);
00350     
00351     /* cleanup */
00352     EagleDbTuple_Delete(tuple);
00353     
00354 #ifndef CUNIT
00355     printf("%d row%s inserted\n\n", rowsInserted, (rowsInserted == 1 ? "" : "s"));
00356 #else
00357     /* this is so the compiler does not complain about unused variable while in CUNIT */
00358     rowsInserted = 0;
00359 #endif
00360     
00361     return EagleTrue;
00362 }

[out] error If an error occurs it will be sent back through this parameter.

Definition at line 233 of file EagleDbInstance.c.

00235     EaglePlan *plan;

00237

00239     /*printf("%s\n", EaglePlan_toString(plan));*/
00240     
00241     /* catch compilation error */
00242     if(EagleTrue == EaglePlan_isError(plan)) {
00243         *error = EagleLogger_Log(EagleLoggerSeverityUserError, plan->errorMessage);
00244         success = EagleFalse;
00245     }
00246     else {
00247         /* execute */
00248         EagleInstance *eagle = EagleInstance_New(1);
00249         EagleInstance_addPlan(eagle, plan);
00250         EagleInstance_run(eagle);
00251         
00252         /* print results */
00253         EagleDbInstance_PrintResults(plan);
00254         EagleInstance_Delete(eagle);
00255     }
00256     
00257     EaglePlan_Delete(plan);
00258     return success;
00259 }

EagleDbTableData* EagleDbInstance_getTable ( EagleDbInstance *  db,
char *  tableName 
)

Get a table by name.

This will only search the EagleDbSchema_DefaultSchemaName schema. It does not support schema name with a dot, yet.

Parameters:
[in] db The database instance.
[in] tableName The raw table name.
Returns:
NULL if the table can not be found.

Definition at line 509 of file EagleDbInstance.c.

00510 {
00511     EagleDbSchema *schema;
00512     
00513     if(NULL == tableName) {
00514         return NULL;
00515     }
00516     
00517     schema = EagleDbInstance_getSchema(db, EagleDbSchema_DefaultSchemaName);
00518     if(NULL != schema) {
00519         EagleLinkedList_Foreach(schema->tables, EagleDbTableData*, table)
00520         {
00521             if(0 == strcmp(tableName, table->table->name)) {
00522                 return table;
00523             }
00524         }
00525         EagleLinkedList_ForeachEnd
00526     }
00527     
00528     return NULL;
00529 }

00046 {
00047     EaglePage **pages;
00048     int i, totalRecords = 0, j;
00049     unsigned long *widths;
00050     
00051     if(NULL == plan) {
00052         return;
00053     }
00054     
00055     if(plan->resultFields > 0 && EaglePageProvider_pagesRemaining(plan->result[0]) > 0) {
00056         /* calculate the widths of the fields */
00057         widths = (unsigned long*) EagleMemory_MultiAllocate("EagleDbInstance_PrintResults.1", sizeof(unsigned long), plan->resultFields);
00058         if(NULL == widths) {
00059             return;
00060         }
00061         for(i = 0; i < plan->resultFields; ++i) {
00062             widths[i] = strlen(plan->result[i]->name);
00063         }
00064         
00065 #ifndef CUNIT

00070                 for(j = 0; j < page->count; ++j) {

00072                             
00073                         case EagleDataTypeInteger:
00074                         {
00075                             char buf[30];
00076                             unsigned long len;
00077                             sprintf(buf, "%d", ((EagleDataTypeIntegerType*) page->data)[j]);
00078                             len = strlen(buf);
00079                             
00080                             if(len > widths[i]) {
00081                                 widths[i] = len;
00082                             }
00083                             
00084                             break;
00085                         }
00086                             
00087                         case EagleDataTypeVarchar:
00088                         {
00089                             unsigned long len = strlen(((EagleDataTypeVarcharType*) page->data)[j]);
00090                             
00091                             if(len > widths[i]) {
00092                                 widths[i] = len;
00093                             }
00094                             
00095                             break;
00096                         }
00097                             
00098                         case EagleDataTypeFloat:
00099                         {
00100                             char buf[30];
00101                             unsigned long len;
00102                             sprintf(buf, "%g", ((EagleDataTypeFloatType*) page->data)[j]);
00103                             len = strlen(buf);
00104                             
00105                             if(len > widths[i]) {
00106                                 widths[i] = len;
00107                             }
00108                             
00109                             break;
00110                         }
00111                             
00112                         case EagleDataTypeUnknown:
00113                             break;
00114                             
00115                     }
00116                 }
00117             }
00118             
00119             EaglePage_Delete(page);
00120         }
00121         for(i = 0; i < plan->resultFields; ++i) {
00122             EaglePageProvider_reset(plan->result[i]);
00123         }
00124         
00125         /* heading */
00126         printf("\n");
00127         for(i = 0; i < plan->resultFields; ++i) {
00128             if(i > 0) {
00129                 printf("|");
00130             }
00131             printf(" %s ", plan->result[i]->name);
00132         }
00133         printf("\n");
00134         
00135         for(i = 0; i < plan->resultFields; ++i) {
00136             if(i > 0) {
00137                 printf("+");
00138             }
00139             for(j = 0; j < (int) widths[i] + 2; ++j) {
00140                 printf("-");
00141             }
00142         }
00143         printf("\n");
00144 #else
00145         /* this is just so the compile doesn't give a warning that totalRecords is not used when CUNIT is running */
00146         j = 0;
00147 #endif
00148     
00149         /* render out */
00150         pages = (EaglePage**) EagleMemory_MultiAllocate("EagleDbInstance_PrintResults.2", sizeof(EaglePage*), plan->resultFields);
00151         if(NULL == pages) {
00152             EagleMemory_Free(widths);
00153             return;
00154         }
00155         
00156 #ifndef CUNIT
00157         while(1) {
00158             int k;
00159             int finished = 0;
00160             
00161             for(i = 0; i < plan->resultFields; ++i) {
00162                 EaglePage *page = EaglePageProvider_nextPage(plan->result[i]);
00163                 if(NULL == page) {
00164                     finished = 1;
00165                     break;
00166                 }
00167                 pages[i] = page;
00168             }
00169             
00170             if(finished == 0) {
00171                 for(j = 0; j < pages[0]->count; ++j) {
00172                     for(k = 0; k < plan->resultFields; ++k) {
00173                         if(k > 0) {
00174                             printf("|");
00175                         }
00176                         
00177                         switch(pages[k]->type) {
00178                                 
00179                             case EagleDataTypeUnknown:
00180                                 printf(" %*s ", (int) widths[k], "?");
00181                                 break;
00182                                 
00183                             case EagleDataTypeInteger:
00184                             {
00185                                 EagleDataTypeIntegerType *d = (EagleDataTypeIntegerType*) pages[k]->data;
00186                                 printf(" %*d ", (int) widths[k], d[j]);
00187                                 break;
00188                             }
00189                                 
00190                             case EagleDataTypeVarchar:
00191                             {
00192                                 EagleDataTypeVarcharType *d = (EagleDataTypeVarcharType*) pages[k]->data;
00193                                 printf(" %-*s ", (int) widths[k], d[j]);
00194                                 break;
00195                             }
00196                                 
00197                             case EagleDataTypeFloat:
00198                             {
00199                                 EagleDataTypeFloatType *d = (EagleDataTypeFloatType*) pages[k]->data;
00200                                 printf(" %*g ", (int) widths[k], d[j]);
00201                                 break;
00202                             }
00203                                 
00204                         }
00205                     }
00206                     printf("\n");
00207                     ++totalRecords;
00208                 }
00209                 
00210                 for(k = 0; k < plan->resultFields; ++k) {
00211                     EaglePage_Delete(pages[k]);
00212                 }
00213             }
00214             else {
00215                 break;
00216             }
00217         }
00218         
00219         printf("\n");
00220 #endif
00221         EagleMemory_Free(widths);
00222         EagleMemory_Free(pages);
00223     }
00224     
00225 #ifndef CUNIT
00226     printf("%d record%s, %.3f seconds\n\n", totalRecords, (totalRecords == 1 ? "" : "s"), EaglePlan_getExecutionSeconds(plan));
00227 #else

00230 #endif
